changeSet.author: anchtun1212
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS jdbc_customer; CREATE TABLE jdbc_customer ( customer_id INT generated BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, full_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, birth_date DATE, gender VARCHAR(50) );

changeSet.author: anchtun1212
anchtun1212
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS jdbc_merchant; CREATE TABLE jdbc_merchant ( merchant_id INT generated BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, merchant_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), description text );

changeSet.author: anchtun1212
anchtun1212
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS jpa_customer; CREATE TABLE jpa_customer ( customer_id INT generated BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, full_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, birth_date DATE, gender VARCHAR(50) );

changeSet.author: anchtun1212
